Sculpture I Did Once Upon a Time

Blog Logo

David Fox

on 22 Nov 2016
read

I actually have a degree in Fine Arts from Mass Art. When I went there I concentrated on sculpture, particularly figurative work of the creepy variety. This is a gallery of some of the work I did there.
